channel.title: New Life Church • Billings, MT
channel.description: Weekly Sunday morning messages from New Life Church in Billings, MT.
channel.author: Danny Houde
channel.itunes:author: Danny Houde
channel.itunes:summary: Weekly Sunday morning messages from New Life Church in Billings, MT.

item.title: Created To Create
item.description: In this message entitled Created to Create, Pastor Zach will explain how we serve a creative God who has made us in His image, so we are designed to be creative. He will share how creativity is reflection, creativity is expression of emotion and worship, and finally creativity is problem solving.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: In this message entitled Created to Create, Pastor Zach will explain how we serve a creative God who has made us in His image, so we are designed to be creative. He will share how creativity is reflection, creativity is expression of emotion and worship, and finally creativity is problem solving.

item.title: Embrace Change
item.description: This is the second message in the series Seasons of Life by Pastor Danny Houde. 2 Corinthians 3:18 clearly states that salvation is all about change. Looking at the Apostle Peter’s life, this message will help you understand that God wants to do a work in you, and that those inward changes should produce an outward change, but ultimately God wants to do a work through you.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the series Seasons of Life by Pastor Danny Houde. 2 Corinthians 3:18 clearly states that salvation is all about change. Looking at the Apostle Peter’s life, this message will help you understand that God wants to do a work in you, and that those inward changes should produce an outward change, but ultimately God wants to do a work through you.

item.title: Embrace Your Season
item.description: This is the first message in the series, Seasons of Life, by Pastor Danny Houde. You will be reminded from Psalm 1:1-3 that there are blessings for how you handle each season of your life. You will be encouraged from Romans 12:2 to live with hope, to understand timing is everything and most importantly to stay close to God.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the series, Seasons of Life, by Pastor Danny Houde. You will be reminded from Psalm 1:1-3 that there are blessings for how you handle each season of your life. You will be encouraged from Romans 12:2 to live with hope, to understand timing is everything and most importantly to stay close to God.

item.title: Nurture Their Nature
item.description: This message by Pastor Danny Houde will encourage and challenge you to be intentional with your discipleship. The nurture that is provided to a person will help to determine their nature, who they become. You will hear that discipleship is the process of spiritual development, that it thrives with loving accountability, that it should be a progressive movement toward maturity, and that if done in a healthy way it will duplicate itself and leave a godly legacy.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This message by Pastor Danny Houde will encourage and challenge you to be intentional with your discipleship. The nurture that is provided to a person will help to determine their nature, who they become. You will hear that discipleship is the process of spiritual development, that it thrives with loving accountability, that it should be a progressive movement toward maturity, and that if done in a healthy way it will duplicate itself and leave a godly legacy.

item.title: Corporate Disciplines
item.description: This is the fourth message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Ronda Kiesser. In this message you will be encouraged to be a healthy functioning part of a local church body. You will hear about the importance of living a submitted life, about living a teachable life, about living a committed life and finally about living a generous life.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the fourth message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Ronda Kiesser. In this message you will be encouraged to be a healthy functioning part of a local church body. You will hear about the importance of living a submitted life, about living a teachable life, about living a committed life and finally about living a generous life.

item.title: Outward Disciplines
item.description: This is the third message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be given some tools that will help you to position yourself next to Jesus so that you can know Him more and have the Holy Spirit continue His work in your life. Those outward disciplines are solitude & silence, contentment and living a Jesus-centered life.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the third message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be given some tools that will help you to position yourself next to Jesus so that you can know Him more and have the Holy Spirit continue His work in your life. Those outward disciplines are solitude & silence, contentment and living a Jesus-centered life.

item.title: Inward Disciplines
item.description: This is the second message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be encouraged to make some decisions to position yourself next to Jesus so that you can know Him more and have His spirit continue His work in your life. Those inward disciplines are simply making a decision to spend time in the Word, time in personal prayer, time guarding your heart and finally taking the time to fast and crucify your flesh.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be encouraged to make some decisions to position yourself next to Jesus so that you can know Him more and have His spirit continue His work in your life. Those inward disciplines are simply making a decision to spend time in the Word, time in personal prayer, time guarding your heart and finally taking the time to fast and crucify your flesh.

item.title: Spiritual Disicplines
item.description: This is the first message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be encouraged out of Ephesians 4:22-24 to put off your old self and to put on the new self. To do this, you need to take an inventory of your spiritual life, start a training regiment and then walk it out by keeping in step with the Spirit.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the Spiritual Disciplines series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be encouraged out of Ephesians 4:22-24 to put off your old self and to put on the new self. To do this, you need to take an inventory of your spiritual life, start a training regiment and then walk it out by keeping in step with the Spirit.

item.title: Can I Get A Witness?
item.description: This is the third and final message in the Easter Perspectives series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will see in Acts 5:32 that even though we were not there to witness the resurrection, the Holy Spirit is our witness. Acts 1:8 says that we are empowered to be witnesses, so we need to "Get Up" from whatever is holding us down, and "Show Up" as the Holy Spirit Leads, and then boldly "Speak Up".
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the third and final message in the Easter Perspectives series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will see in Acts 5:32 that even though we were not there to witness the resurrection, the Holy Spirit is our witness. Acts 1:8 says that we are empowered to be witnesses, so we need to "Get Up" from whatever is holding us down, and "Show Up" as the Holy Spirit Leads, and then boldly "Speak Up".

item.title: Recognizing God's Plan
item.description: This is the second message in the Easter Perspectives series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will see in Luke 19:41-44 that Jesus wept over the fact that the people did not recognize God's plan. The disciples were excited when Jesus entered Jerusalem thinking that He was soon to become their king, but they scattered in fear when God's plan didn't line up with their hopes. God's plan was spiritual in nature, and their lives were rocked when their natural circumstances didn't go as expected.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the Easter Perspectives series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will see in Luke 19:41-44 that Jesus wept over the fact that the people did not recognize God's plan. The disciples were excited when Jesus entered Jerusalem thinking that He was soon to become their king, but they scattered in fear when God's plan didn't line up with their hopes. God's plan was spiritual in nature, and their lives were rocked when their natural circumstances didn't go as expected.

item.title: The Gospel Is For Everyone
item.description: This is the first message in the Easter Perspectives series by Lance Lanning. In this message you will be encouraged to share the love of God with the world around you.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the Easter Perspectives series by Lance Lanning. In this message you will be encouraged to share the love of God with the world around you.

item.title: Worship Makes A Way
item.description: This is the third message in the Peace Through The Storms series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be encouraged to let worship be a central part of your life, and something that you are continually growing in. It starts with letting your life be worship, then you worship in spirit and in truth, and then you will be able to watch God make a way through the storm.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the third message in the Peace Through The Storms series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message you will be encouraged to let worship be a central part of your life, and something that you are continually growing in. It starts with letting your life be worship, then you worship in spirit and in truth, and then you will be able to watch God make a way through the storm.

item.title: Face Your Enemy
item.description: This is the second message in the Peace Through The Storms series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message, you will be encouraged from James 1:2-4 to face the storms and circumstances in your life by facing your greatest enemy, the thoughts in your mind! You don't have to give into the Enemy of Fear, the Enemy of Failure and the Enemy of Falsehood.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the Peace Through The Storms series by Pastor Danny Houde. In this message, you will be encouraged from James 1:2-4 to face the storms and circumstances in your life by facing your greatest enemy, the thoughts in your mind! You don't have to give into the Enemy of Fear, the Enemy of Failure and the Enemy of Falsehood.

item.title: Are You Anchored?
item.description: This is the first message in the Peace Through The Storms series by Pastor Danny Houde. He encourages us from Hebrews Chapter 6 to make Christ our anchor, to hold firm to that anchor, and finally to be willing to lengthen the rope!
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the Peace Through The Storms series by Pastor Danny Houde. He encourages us from Hebrews Chapter 6 to make Christ our anchor, to hold firm to that anchor, and finally to be willing to lengthen the rope!

item.title: Covenant Keeping God
item.description: This is a message by Pastor Ronda Kiesser where she shares a timely word about God's Covenant with His people, but specifically his chosen people the Jews.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is a message by Pastor Ronda Kiesser where she shares a timely word about God's Covenant with His people, but specifically his chosen people the Jews.

item.title: Truth-Equipped
item.description: This is the fourth and final message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from Acts 17  about how the Bereans were eager to learn and that they used the Scriptures as their filter for Truth. Pastor Danny will share that we should:  be eager for truth, filter everything through the Word, conform our lives to the Word and then share the Truth with the world.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the fourth and final message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from Acts 17  about how the Bereans were eager to learn and that they used the Scriptures as their filter for Truth. Pastor Danny will share that we should:  be eager for truth, filter everything through the Word, conform our lives to the Word and then share the Truth with the world.

item.title: Love-Driven
item.description: This is the third message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from 2 Corinthians 5:4 that Christ's love compels us and should therefore be a driving force in our lives. Pastor Danny will share that a genuine love for God will drive obedience, drive inclusion and drive sacrifice.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the third message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from 2 Corinthians 5:4 that Christ's love compels us and should therefore be a driving force in our lives. Pastor Danny will share that a genuine love for God will drive obedience, drive inclusion and drive sacrifice.

item.title: Faith-Filled
item.description: This is the second message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from Hebrews 11 about how living a life of faith is pleasing to God. Pastor Danny will share that faith is a gift, that your faith can increase and finally that you will live your life according to your level of faith.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from Hebrews 11 about how living a life of faith is pleasing to God. Pastor Danny will share that faith is a gift, that your faith can increase and finally that you will live your life according to your level of faith.

item.title: Made For More
item.description: This is the first message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from John Chapter 6 and reminding us to make sure that we are coming to God because of a spiritual desire and not just for natural things. Pastor Danny will also explain that the way we can continue believing God for more in our lives is to look ahead, push forward and ask what the next one thing is that we need to focus on.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the Made For More series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from John Chapter 6 and reminding us to make sure that we are coming to God because of a spiritual desire and not just for natural things. Pastor Danny will also explain that the way we can continue believing God for more in our lives is to look ahead, push forward and ask what the next one thing is that we need to focus on.

item.title: Money Matters Matter
item.description: This is the fourth and final message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Hall. He will be sharing about God's Perspective on finances and challenging us to make sure that when it comes to money that we are asking God to get involved, that we are doing what He says, and that we are being patient; trusting that God's ways are the best way .
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the fourth and final message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Hall. He will be sharing about God's Perspective on finances and challenging us to make sure that when it comes to money that we are asking God to get involved, that we are doing what He says, and that we are being patient; trusting that God's ways are the best way .

item.title: Love or Assumptions?
item.description: This is the third message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from 1 John 4:20-21 and encouraging us to make sure that we are not putting up walls between us and others by making assumptions when we are called to love well. It is important to value everyone, to speak life over people and to always be gracious and quick to forgive.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the third message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from 1 John 4:20-21 and encouraging us to make sure that we are not putting up walls between us and others by making assumptions when we are called to love well. It is important to value everyone, to speak life over people and to always be gracious and quick to forgive.

item.title: Why or Why Not?
item.description: This is the second message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from the book of Philippians and encouraging believers to understand the importance of giving thought to your steps, guarding your influences and standing firm with absolutes.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from the book of Philippians and encouraging believers to understand the importance of giving thought to your steps, guarding your influences and standing firm with absolutes.

item.title: What Do You See?
item.description: This is the first message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from 2 Peter 1:3-11 and encouraging us to make sure that we are not limiting our lives by focusing only on what we see in the natural. When we begin to see life through God's perspective, we can easily answer the following questions:  Do you see that you are fully equipped? Do you see the role you play? Do you see the change?
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the New Perspective series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing from 2 Peter 1:3-11 and encouraging us to make sure that we are not limiting our lives by focusing only on what we see in the natural. When we begin to see life through God's perspective, we can easily answer the following questions:  Do you see that you are fully equipped? Do you see the role you play? Do you see the change?

item.title: What Are You Doing With The Gift?
item.description: In this message from Pastor Ronda, she shares from Romans 8:31-32 how God has given us all the same gift, how that gift includes all things, and that we need to experience the fullness of the gift.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: In this message from Pastor Ronda, she shares from Romans 8:31-32 how God has given us all the same gift, how that gift includes all things, and that we need to experience the fullness of the gift.

item.title: Getting it Right
item.description: In this message from Pastor Danny, he shares how God had a plan fo redemption that played out by Jesus being in the right place, at the right time, with the right people and therefore got the right results. God also has a purpose for our lives and when we purpose to be in the right place, at the right time, with the right people we also will get the right results.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: In this message from Pastor Danny, he shares how God had a plan fo redemption that played out by Jesus being in the right place, at the right time, with the right people and therefore got the right results. God also has a purpose for our lives and when we purpose to be in the right place, at the right time, with the right people we also will get the right results.

item.title: Comfort & Joy
item.description: This inspiring message by Pastor Laurie Houde will encourage you to receive the comfort & joy that Jesus has given us and then to give that same comfort and joy to others.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This inspiring message by Pastor Laurie Houde will encourage you to receive the comfort & joy that Jesus has given us and then to give that same comfort and joy to others.

item.title: More Compassion, Less Indifference
item.description: This is the fourth message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing how we can avoid indifference and stir up compassion by dealing with the sin in our lives, beginning to pray for people, positioning ourselves around people and then simply doing what we know to do.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the fourth message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing how we can avoid indifference and stir up compassion by dealing with the sin in our lives, beginning to pray for people, positioning ourselves around people and then simply doing what we know to do.

item.title: More Gratitude, Less Negativity
item.description: This is the third message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing how we can learn from Jesus to give thanks before our needs are met, to give thanks when obedience is hard and to not function with an entitlement mentality.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the third message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be sharing how we can learn from Jesus to give thanks before our needs are met, to give thanks when obedience is hard and to not function with an entitlement mentality.

item.title: More Forgiveness, Less Finger-Pointing
item.description: This is the second message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be explaining how when we die to ourselves, we will stop putting labels on people, stop putting lids on people and we will stop limiting our forgiveness.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be explaining how when we die to ourselves, we will stop putting labels on people, stop putting lids on people and we will stop limiting our forgiveness.

item.title: More or Less
item.description: This is the first message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be expounding on the idea in John 3:30 where it says, "He must become greater; I must become less."
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the More or Less series by Pastor Danny. He will be expounding on the idea in John 3:30 where it says, "He must become greater; I must become less."

item.title: The Power of Corporate Prayer
item.description: This is the third message in the Firsts From the Book of Acts series by Pastor Danny Houde. He will be sharing about the first prayer meeting of the New Testament Church and how much prayer produces much power in the lives of those who are followers of Christ.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the third message in the Firsts From the Book of Acts series by Pastor Danny Houde. He will be sharing about the first prayer meeting of the New Testament Church and how much prayer produces much power in the lives of those who are followers of Christ.

item.title: The Cost of Following Jesus
item.description: This is the second message in the Firsts From the Book of Acts series by Pastor Ronda Kiesser. She will be sharing about the first martyr in the New Testament and get you thinking about the cost of following Jesus.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the second message in the Firsts From the Book of Acts series by Pastor Ronda Kiesser. She will be sharing about the first martyr in the New Testament and get you thinking about the cost of following Jesus.

item.title: The First Witnesses
item.description: This is the first message in the Firsts From the Book of Acts series by Pastor Danny Houde. Acts 1:8 says the believers received the Holy Spirit to be a witness and he shares how they had an experience, they had something to say, and the Holy Spirit's power was evident in their personal lives as well as in their public lives.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is the first message in the Firsts From the Book of Acts series by Pastor Danny Houde. Acts 1:8 says the believers received the Holy Spirit to be a witness and he shares how they had an experience, they had something to say, and the Holy Spirit's power was evident in their personal lives as well as in their public lives.

item.title: The Goodness of God
item.description: This is a message by Pastor Danny Houde that talks about how we can easily lose heart if we do not believe that God is good, no matter the circumstances.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is a message by Pastor Danny Houde that talks about how we can easily lose heart if we do not believe that God is good, no matter the circumstances.

item.title: Church Friends
item.description: This message by Pastor Danny Houde will help you understand the value of spiritual friendships, and how you can be that type of friend.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This message by Pastor Danny Houde will help you understand the value of spiritual friendships, and how you can be that type of friend.

item.title: Spiritual or Worldly?
item.description: This message by Pastor Danny will help you see the difference between living like the world or living by the Spirit.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This message by Pastor Danny will help you see the difference between living like the world or living by the Spirit.

item.title: Marriage Goals
item.description: This is a message by Pastors Danny & Laurie Houde that will help you relationally, especially in your marriage.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is a message by Pastors Danny & Laurie Houde that will help you relationally, especially in your marriage.

item.title: I Love My Family
item.description: This is a message by Pastor Danny Houde about the power of being a healthy part of a church family.
item.dc:creator: Danny Houde
item.itunes:summary: This is a message by Pastor Danny Houde about the power of being a healthy part of a church family.
